text: @BarackObama @Ysastep @MichelleObama Thank you. My mother is responsible for my 7 sisters and 4 brothers. Education is the reason we are all out of property.  God Bless America in these difficult times.  COVID19 is the devils that prayers can’t get rid of. Only votes can get them gone.
